alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Lee; Magoffin; Martin; Owsley; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 9:12PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Martin, northeastern Owsley, Johnson, northern Floyd, Breathitt, Magoffin, southern Lee and southeastern Wolfe Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 912 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bobbs to Tallega. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Paintsville, Bobbs, Williamsport, Thelma, Offutt, Tutor Key, Perston Estates, Woodland Estates, River and Thealka around 915 PM EDT. Meally, Boons Camp, Wells Chapel, Buffalo, Oaklawn Estates and East Point around 920 PM EDT. Van Lear around 925 PM EDT. Prestonsburg, Nero, Auxier and Bays Branch around 930 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Odds, Davisport, Yeadon, Gentry, Delong, Pevier, Debord, Elkatawa, Lancer, Houston, Dicks Creek, Davella, Arnett and Corn Fork Hollow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Lee; Magoffin; Martin; Owsley; Wolfe
